articles.title: “I Was With an Argentine..” – Shakira Affectionately Refers to Ex-Boyfriend Antonio de la Rua, Son of Argentina’s Former President, During Tonight’s Show With Jimmy Fallon
articles.description: Shakira affectionately makes a reference to her ex-boyfriend, Antonio de la Rua from decades ago whilst backstage on Jimmy Fallon's show.

articles.title: GRAINS-Soybeans firm on Argentine crop losses, wheat eyes 1st weekly gain in five
articles.description: SINGAPORE, March 17 (Reuters) - Chicago soybean futures rose for a second session on Friday with a further reduction in drought-hit Argentina's production estimate underpinning the market.Wheat rose 0.8% and was poised for a first weekly gain in five weeks as the market awaited renewal of a Russia-Ukraine export deal, while corn edged up amid Chinese buying.FUNDAMENTALS* The
articles.content:
SINGAPORE, March 17 (Reuters) - Chicago soybean futures rose for a second session on Friday with a further reduction in drought-hit Argentina's production estimate underpinning the market.
Wheat rose 0.8% and was poised for a first weekly gain in fiv... [3200 chars]

articles.title: Watch the emotional trailer for Netflix's new series about Latin American rock icon Fito Paez
articles.description: Netflix has released a trailer for its upcoming series El Amor Despues del Amor, about the life and career of Argentina's Fito Paez.
articles.content: Argentina is the birthplace of so many icons of Latin American rock, including everyone from Soda Stereo frontman Gustavo Cerati to Charly Garcia, Luis Alberto Spinetta, and Fito Paez — the latter of whom, just months after scooping up a new batch of... [1797 chars]

articles.title: Indonesia Oks GMO drought-tolerant wheat from Argentina's Bioceres
articles.description: By Maximilian HeathBUENOS AIRES, March 16 (Reuters) - The Indonesian government has approved a variety of GMO wheat for human consumption designed to better resist drought, leading Argentine biotech firm Bioceres Crop Solutions Corp and developer of the HB4 wheat told Reuters on Thursday.The latest HB4 wheat authorization moves beyond the genetically modified grain's approved

articles.title: Argentina hikes interest rate 300 basis points after inflation breaks 100% barrier
articles.description: Argentina's central bank board said it agreed to hike the country's benchmark interest rate by 300 basis points to 78% on Thursday after annual inflation hit 100% for the first time in over three decades.
articles.content: Argentina's central bank board said it agreed to hike the country's benchmark interest rate by 300 basis points to 78% on Thursday after annual inflation hit 100% for the first time in over three decades. The decision, confirming earlier reporting by... [1468 chars]

articles.title: Argentines struggle to make ends meet amid 100% inflation
articles.description: BUENOS AIRES, Argentina (AP) — Jesica Fernández used to join seven family members every weekend for a large beef barbeque. Beef is no longer on the me...
articles.content:
BUENOS AIRES, Argentina (AP) — Jesica Fernández used to join seven family members every weekend for a large beef barbeque. Beef is no longer on the menu, and now they’re more likely to eat spaghetti or chicken wings.
In beef-loving Argentina, barbequ... [3923 chars]
